p: Another study [ 90] showed the effect of different M. vulgare extracts (methanol, water, and buthanol) on autoimmune diabetes mellitus induced by cyclosporine and streptozotocin. When compared to diabetic mice, the animals from the group treated with extracts of M. vulgare showed a decrease in blood glucose levels, pancreatic levels of interferon gamma (IFN-Î³), and NO. M. vulgare extracts also caused a significant decrease in total cholesterol, low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol, very-low-density lipoprotein (VLDL) cholesterol, and triglycerides. Additionally, the serum insulin levels were significantly increased after treatment with M. vulgare.
